message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, it's worth more than $120 to me. However, considering your needs and expectations, I propose a fair deal of $100 for this exceptional product. This price not only ensures a valuable return for me but also provides you with a great opportunity to experience its benefits at a reasonable cost. I trust that you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response.
